website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for something simple and durable with a no-slip surface, this versatile spa side step could be for you.
pros: 5 color choices to match your particular hot tub
Versatile – some people have used it as a step into a tall bed
Price is good for the quality you get
cons: The weight limit caps off at 300 pounds or slightly less

customer_reviews.title: Solid, extra wide spa step
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Good construction and solid yet not so heavy it can’t be moved around. I like that the step is extra wide with space on both sides of my feet when standing on it plus it’s sturdy. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Maarten

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These steps were inexpensive, but sturdy and easy to assemble. They get the job done and are light enough to move easily when we need to mow.
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: Might be a bit weak in the middle for heavy people
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, and for the price, perfect. Step in the middle at 225 lbs and it sinks down. Not a show stopper but it will make you feel unsure at times. Otherwise, worth the price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Pieraldi

customer_reviews.title: ALL I NEED IS A HOT TUB
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these steps after giving away my $7,000 hot tub and my $89.00 steps. The new hot tub was returned but these steps are going to be perfect for the next hot tub purchase. In the interim they are great for lining up my plants on the new deck. No lose here. Nothing but love.
customer_reviews.author: Scorp2Scorp

customer_reviews.title: Ok but concerned about weight limit.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as hoped. Using this for RV steps (wanted something deeper and wider than what came with the camper). Will have to modify it slightly as it is not as tall as our original steps (knew that already) but steps are slightly springy. The weight limit is not on the box but we saw 300 lbs. in the FAQs. Since we have to modify the height, we may add something to support the steps better. Looks nice, better than something we would have made and easy to put together. Just snaps. Used the straight step on the upper step and curved on the lower. OK other than the springy steps.
customer_reviews.author: Ritas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Steps
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and very easy to assemble following the instructions on the box, takes less than 5 minutes. Quality materials, looks fine. I use it for steps coming out of a doggie door into our patio, nice and wide for the dog, right height.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: There's a little "give" to the steps, but otherwise these work well.
customer_reviews.text: These steps are well-made and do the job. Rated 4 instead of 5 because they sag a bit in the middle when I step on them (my weight is 180 lbs.). I don't think they're going to break; it's just a little disconcerting when they sag slightly. There's no weight rating in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Steven O.

customer_reviews.title: Collects water, but you can tip it
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a lot for a piece of plastic, but sturdy and I feel safe. We tilt it on its side when we get out, to let water run off so it doesn’t form ice.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgirl

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These steps look nice, feel very sturdy, and were so easy to assemble. Just make sure you have the top step facing the correct way for your shape of hot tub. I had a rubber mallet ready to use, but I ended up not needing it as I just stood on the bottom step and it clicked in and sat on the top step and it clicked in. I think it took all of 90 seconds to put these together.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Honestly I didn't even read the directions. Seems to be very sturdy. They are wide so you feel safe walking up and down them. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Sturdy and durable. Have used them for over a year outside and they are holding up very nicely. The color is not facing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lake

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great
customer_reviews.text: We actually used theses for steps out our back patio door until we get the deck put in. Look very nice and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Outen

customer_reviews.title: Not very Sturdy - Thin Plastic
customer_reviews.text: These steps are make of thin plastic and not very sturdy. I bought different steps from a spa company for about the price. They were also plastic but was better quality and I did not feel like they were going to break when they were walked on.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Jean Foster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A good looking piece and very sturdy - no buckling upon stepping. A good size, as well. Wide-enough to accommodate exiting from the hot tub without fear of missing the step!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Snow

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied....I purchased for doggie steps. Much better than the doggie steps I previously purchased. Well constructed...easy to put together. I only wish they had a skid resistant texture. But overall, very good product
customer_reviews.author: Tina Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok not great.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered grey color but received a black one. It’s not as sturdy as they say. I put mine on laminate floors and it slides around like it’s on ice because it’s light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Melikyan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for the price. Wish it was all one piece
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my need
customer_reviews.text: I love the steps but didn't work out for what I wanted. Our newer king size bed is too tall for me to get up in to and (hubby doesn't know) my dog won't use them! I will find a use for them though, someone else mentioned an t.v. so I"'ll see if they work for that.
customer_reviews.author: MTC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as what we envisioned, but love the color and height is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Davianne Coley

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty. We are large folk and these feel nice and sturdy getting in and out of the spa.
customer_reviews.author: Corene E Rodder

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Looks good. A little bow in the middle of step when you walk up or down. MAKE IN THE USA!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to make entering/exiting our hot tub easy.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a wooden two step in front of my spa. Easy to assemble. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Count Me Out

customer_reviews.title: Good hot tub step
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Feels a little bit cheap but it does the job as a tub step.
customer_reviews.author: Lance W.

customer_reviews.title: Great great deal
customer_reviews.text: Super amazing way nicer then what i thought by far, love them
customer_reviews.author: Dina St.John

customer_reviews.title: product was good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the height of the steps for our hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Lora L. Hostal

customer_reviews.title: Great Steps
customer_reviews.text: We needed steps for our hot tub and these steps fit the bill perfectly. They are sturdy and they were very easy to put together. They are also not slippery when you are wet getting out of the hot tub. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The redwood color I ordered is dark charcoal. I wish it was slightly more stout. There is a lot of bounce. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and maintain
customer_reviews.text: We put this product in one of our toddler bathrooms for the children to sit on and wait their turn to use the potty. Easy to disinfect, low enough that they won't fall and get hurt. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spa steps work great for our spa
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and work great for getting in and out of our spa. Good quality for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Munson

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy, affordable steps! Arrived quickly, assembled even quicker. I also like that they can be configured for a round or rectangular tub. Bonus! Great purchase so far as I can see!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, helps with access to/from our hot tub, ugly color.
customer_reviews.author: S. Soule

customer_reviews.title: Great step
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The width is perfect and the color is great for a redwood stained spa enclosure
customer_reviews.author: K. Chi

customer_reviews.title: FLAWLESS CHOICE - FLAWLESS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS JUST THE PERFECT CHOICE FOR ENTERING AND LEAVING OUR NEW HOT TUB. WE ARE SO IMPRESSED WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Big Lar

customer_reviews.title: VERY FLEXIBLE,MATERIAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS GOOD BUT ONCE SOMEONE STEPS ON IT; THEY (STEPS) FEEL IT'S GOING TO COME APART???
customer_reviews.author: Chip  McGough

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how quickly the shipping was! I was pleased with the quality and design .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together than others said. Just a touch slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Haney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Perfect if you just need a little boost to get in your spa.
customer_reviews.author: chris westrich

customer_reviews.title: Color in pic does not match the one received
customer_reviews.text: The color shown in the pic was not the color I received
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
